name: Help Me Help You Help Them
name_original: Help Me Help You Help Them
description:
your mission: save the (stationary) greens; avoid the (running) reds.

  • (brown) tank can take hits
  • (blue) healer can heal things
  • tank and healer are buddies, but they cannot fight back.
  • score many points before time is up

Controls:

  • ARROW keys = move tank. 
  • WASD + SPACE = move healer + launch health shots
